questions.question: Which HTML element is used to define the structure of an HTML document?
What is the correct HTML tag for creating an unordered list?
Which HTML element is used for creating hyperlinks?
What is the purpose of the HTML <head> element?
options: To define the main content of the web page.
To define the header section of the web page.
To specify the metadata of the web page.
questions.correctAnswer: To specify the metadata of the web page.

questions.question: Which HTML tag is used to insert a line break within a paragraph?
Which attribute is used to specify the alternative text for an image in HTML?
What is the purpose of the HTML <form> element?
options: To define a section of the web page.
To create a user input form.
questions.correctAnswer: To create a user input form.

questions.question: Which HTML tag is used to define a table row?
